original_text: Jacob answered and said to Laban, “Because I was afraid, for I thought that you would take your daughters from me by force.
korean_text: 야곱이 라반에게 대답하여 이르되 내가 생각하기를 외삼촌이 외삼촌의 딸들을 내게서 억지로 빼앗으리라 하여 두려워하였음이니이다

sentences.original_text: Jacob answered and said to Laban,
that you would take your daughters from me by force.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 폭력으로 당신의 딸들을 내게서 빼앗아 갈까 하여입니다.
